name: SMART
description:
SMART is an award-winning full-service creative advertising agency offering brand strategy, creative development, digital, social media, SEM, marketing and design across Melbourne, Sydney, Brisbane and the Gold Coast. A local Australian agency where global brands feel right at home, SMART is a specialist, independently managed advertising agency within McCann Worldgroup, a recognized world leader in marketing and advertising solutions.
SMART has created high-profile campaigns for some of the region's most recognized local and global brands, including Adidas, Australand, Coca Cola Amatil, Boutique Homes, Spotlight, Anaconda as well as state and federal governments. Excitingly, as of 2013, McCann Worldgroup is Australia's most awarded agency network with our creative work recognized at all the major international advertising festivals, including the Cannes Lions International Advertising Festival, D&AD, Siren Awards, One Show, Clio Awards, and local Australian advertising shows including the Australian Writers and Art Directors (AWARD). From a business perspective, the agency has also been recognised in the B&T and AdNews Agency of the Year Awards as well as the BRW Fast 100.
